statements: DELETE FROM car_maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change'
DELETE FROM car_maintenance_history WHERE car_id = 1 AND maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM car_maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND cost > 100.00;
DELETE FROM car_data WHERE car_model = 'Toyota Corolla' AND mileage > 100000;
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_cost < 500 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM SensorsData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SensorsData WHERE sensor_value < 50 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE car_id = 123 AND reading < 50.00;
